amendment.description: To reauthorize the Export-Import Bank of the United States.

action.text: Amendment SA 1836 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1836.
Cloture on amendment SA 1836 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 44. Record Vote Number: 52.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 1836 presented in Senate.

Amendment SA 1836 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Cantwell to language proposed to be stricken by amendment no. SA 1833. (consideration: CR S1693-1694; text: CR S1694) To reauthorize the Export-Import Bank of the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1836 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Cantwell to language proposed to be stricken by amendment no. SA 1833.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Cloture on amendment SA 1836 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 44. Record Vote Number: 52.
